thread.title: Stover, Upper Dublin roll past Upper Moreland
thread.title_full: Stover, Upper Dublin roll past Upper Moreland

title: Stover, Upper Dublin roll past Upper Moreland
text:
More coverage: Southeastern Pa. high school sports A run for a loss of 3 yards on Upper Dublin's first drive. A 13-yard loss on a sack in the second quarter. 
It didn't happen often, but when Upper Dublin erred, Stover was quick with an answer for the Cardinals. 
After the loss of 3, he launched a 56-yard pass to wideout Cole Swiger, which set up a 3-yard touchdown run from Kaleif Lee, the first of his two scores. 
Stover responded to the sack with back-to-back 19-yard completions, and then capped the drive off with a 22-yard strike to Danny Boggs. 
But the most significant cleanup, the one that set the tone for the rest of the evening, didn't come on a subsequent play. It came on the following drive. 
On Upper Dublin's second drive of the evening, Jack Rapine, making his first start at tight end, fumbled a catch deep in Upper Moreland territory. 
Rather than get frustrated, Stover and Rapine talked it over on the sideline. And in a minute, it was behind them. "We just wiped the slate clean," Stover indicated. "It was on to the next one." 
Stover said he told Rapine he liked the effort on the play, but that he could have made a smarter play and secured the ball. 
So on the very next drive, who did Stover look for in the end zone? None other than No. 9, Rapine. Stover hit the tight end from 10 yards out to put Upper Dublin up, 14-0, early in the second quarter. 
"He can run, he can pass, and you know that, if you're running a route, the pass is going to be dead on, right to you," Rapine explained. 
Stover finished the evening 13 for 18 for 224 yards, with three touchdowns and one interception. 
Even Stover wasn't perfect. He threw that interception, his own mistake of the night. 
But he sure knows how to fix a problem. 
Upper Moreland 0 0 0 7 - 7 
Upper Dublin 7 14 7 7 - 35 
UD: Kaleif Lee 3 run (Todd Spirt kick) 
UD: Jack Rapine 10 pass from Ryan Stover (Spirt kick) 
UD: Danny Boggs 22 pass from Stover (Spirt kick) 
UD: Sowers 10 pass from Stover (Spirt kick) 
UM: Morgan 11 run (Randy Meehl kick) 
UD: Lee 60 run (Sprit kick)
